title: Malicious PyPI Package Masquerades as Chimera Module to Steal AWS, CI/CD, and macOS Data
summary:
Cybersecurity researchers have discovered a malicious package on the Python Package Index (PyPI) repository that's capable of harvesting sensitive developer-related information, such as credentials, configuration data, and environment variables, among others.

title: ChatGPT's AI coder Codex now lets you choose the best solution
summary: ChatGPT's Codex, which is an AI agent that lets you code and delegate programming tasks, is now testing a new feature that lets you choose the best solution. [...]
